channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM Corporation -- WebSphere Application Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM Corporation -- WebSphere Application Server

item.title: CVE-2017-1121|2024-08-05T13:25:17.230Z -- ibm%20corporation -- websphere%20application%20server
item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server 7.0, 8.0, and 9.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM Reference #: 1997743

item.title: CVE-2017-1137|2024-08-05T13:25:17.235Z -- ibm%20corporation -- websphere%20application%20server
item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server 8.0 and 8.5.5 could provide weaker than expected security. A remote attacker could exploit this weakness to obtain sensitive information and gain unauthorized access to the admin console. IBM X-Force ID: 121549.

item.title: CVE-2017-1151|2024-08-05T13:25:17.345Z -- ibm%20corporation -- websphere%20application%20server
item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server 8.0, 8.5, 8.5.5, and 9.0 using OpenID Connect (OIDC) configured with a Trust Association Interceptor (TAI) could allow a user to gain elevated privileges on the system. IBM Reference #: 1999293.
